answers.q: e523 island /coral princess what is the obstruction
answers.a: This appears unrelated to the food additive E523; in foods, E523 denotes aluminium ammonium sulphate (ammonium alum), a stabiliser permitted only in specific applications and at low levels due to aluminium limits.

answers.q: e523 island princess what is the obstruction
answers.a: That seems to reference a cruise-cabin code, not the additive; E523 on food labels is aluminium ammonium sulphate, a stabiliser allowed in limited uses with strict aluminium intake limits.

answers.q: how to install rv designer e523 monaco/tiffin style baggage door
answers.a: That product code is for RV hardware, not the food additive; in food, E523 refers to aluminium ammonium sulphate, a synthetic mineral-derived stabiliser used in small amounts under tight regulatory limits.
